About Our College

Easwari Engineering College, a unit of SRM Group of Educational Institutions for higher learning is functioning under “Valliammai Society”. The society was founded in the year 1981, for promoting the cause of Quality Education by Dr.T.R.Pachamuthu, an academician and Educationist. EEC was instituted in the academic year 1996-1997, with the Approval of AICTE, New Delhi. The Institution is affiliated to Anna University, since 2002. The college has obtained ISO 9001:2015 Certiﬁcation from TUV South Asia. The college is accredited with ‘A’ Grade by NAAC.

About Asthivaara 2K19

ASTHIVAARA 2K19” is the 9th National Level Symposium organised by the Department of Civil Engineering. The theme of the Symposium is “ENVIRONMENTAL AWARENESS AND MODERN TECHNOLOGY”. Our Symposium includes a total of 9 Technical events, 10 Non-technical events, and 3 Online events and Special events for school children (Asthivaara Jrs).

VENUE: Easwari Engineering College, Bharathi salai, Ramapuram, Chennai-89.

About Our Department

The Department of Civil Engineering has been established in the College since the year 2007 – 2008. Since inception, the Department of Civil Engineering has been imparting knowledge in ‘General Engineering Concepts’ and ‘Studies’ in ‘Civil Engineering’. With the concurrent acquisition of technical skills in labs, inspiration and awakening of the young minds by vibrant teachers, the students are engaged intellectually in the college. These critical contributions lead the students to explore and discover the wonders of their minds, which in turn synergize together and enable the students transform themselves to become true engineers and technologists. Irrespective of their branch of study for specialization, students are guided in the first year to explore new ideas through original thinking and discover new layers of knowledge and abilities, in Mathematics, Sciences and in Engineering and Technology. With character, dedication, brilliance, effectiveness and enthusiasm, they become capable and also analytical in their approach and transform themselves as Engineering Professionals of the future, with ethics.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR PAYMENT

Participant(s) need to pay registration fee through online mode or spot registration (First come First serve basis)

Registration fee Rs.200/- per participant (General)

Registration fee includes kit and working lunch
